summary_text: A mother and wife stricken with memory loss allows a dysfunctional family a second chance at harmony and happiness.

name: Kaadhal Konden
summary_text: Exploring into the mind of a youth who is mentally and physically abused in his childhood, the film shows how he slowly turns into a psychopath who kills anyone who comes in the way of the girl for whom he has an obsessive love!

name: A Handful of Dust
summary_text: The wife's affair and a death in the family hasten the demise of an upper-class English marriage.

name: Animalympics
summary_text: The animal kingdom stages its own olympic games.

name: The Comedians
summary_text: A cynical Welsh hotel owner secretly romances a diplomat's wife in Haiti, under the violent reign of the despot "Papa Doc" Duvalier.

name: The Student of Prague
summary_text: Balduin, a student of Prague, leaves his roystering companions in the beer garden, when he finds he has reached the end of his resources. He is scarcely seated in a quiet corner when a ...                See full summary »

name: Argo 2
summary_text: Hungarian small time crook, 70 year old Tibi Balog gets out of prison after 10 years, but he didn't change a bit. When a Japanese crime syndicate hires him to acquire a Hungarian invention ...                See full summary »

name: The Dead 2: India
summary_text: An infectious epidemic spreads through India as an American turbine engineer learns that his pregnant girlfriend is trapped near the slums of Mumbai. Now he must battle his way across a 300mile wasteland of the ravenous undead.

name: You Got Served: Beat the World
summary_text: Three dance crews prepare to do battle at the international Beat the World competition in Detroit. In the final showdown to become world champions lifelong hopes, dreams and even lives, are at stake.

name: Otto; or, Up with Dead People
summary_text: Otto is a handsome, sensitive, neo-Goth zombie with an identity crisis wandering the streets of the city, until one day he auditions for a zombie film...

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
summary_text: Hit-man Felix has quit his criminal activities and found employment minding a rich man's adult son. Meanwhile, Felix's old criminal gang have issued a hit on Felix.

name: Saint Jack
summary_text: Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early 1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to lead a life of luxury.

name: Ride
summary_text: A cautionary tale aimed at a technology-obsessed society.

name: Une famille à louer
summary_text: Depressed by his loneliness, Paul-André, a shy and wealthy man, offers to rent the family of a good-natured woman with two kids in exchange for settling her debts.

name: Iliza Shlesinger: War Paint
summary_text: Her innocent good looks are just a cover for Last Comic Standing winner Iliza Shlesinger's acerbic, stream-of-conscious comedy that she unleashes on an unsuspecting audience in her hometown of Dallas in her stand-up special "War Paint."

name: Mary
summary_text: The Virgin Mary delivers a message to an 11-year-old girl.

name: Numbered Days
summary_text: A member of the ETA terrorist organization belongs to a commando which is preparing an outrage in Madrid. But he sets other priorities when he meets a girl who is addicted to drugs and for ...                See full summary »

name: Side Out
summary_text: A law student comes to California for the summer and ends up playing professional volleyball.

name: Shakma
summary_text: A group of medical students are attacked by an aggressive laboratory animal while competing in an after-hours role-playing game at their school.

name: The Parts You Lose
summary_text: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

name: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
summary_text: In the wake of two back-to-back mass murders on Chico's frat row, loner Brent Chirino must infiltrate the ranks of a popular fraternity to investigate his twin brother's murder at the hands of the serial killer known as "Motherface."

name: Paziraie sadeh
summary_text: An Iranian couple from the city drive around a remote mountainous region. They hand out bags of money to poor villagers in return for them carrying out unusual requests the couple make of them.

name: Destere
summary_text: A comedy film about a parody saw movies.

name: Introducing the Dwights
summary_text: The shy son of an aging comedienne tries to find a balance between his demanding home life, his new girlfriend, and his mother's second chance at fame.

name: Kadhalukku Mariyadhai
summary_text: Jeevanandhan "Jeeva" (Vijay) is a very rich young man. Although his parents (Sivakumar and Srividhya) want him to settle down, he goes to another city to do his MBA and stays with friends. ...                See full summary »

name: Slaughterhouse
summary_text: The owner of a slaughterhouse facing foreclosure instructs his obese and mentally disabled son to go on a killing spree against the people who want to buy his property.

name: The Chosen
summary_text: In 1944, in Brooklyn, two Jewish kids become friends. One is from a very conservative family, and the other is more liberal. The issues of importance of tradition, parental expectations and the formation of Israel cause constant friction.

name: Sax Rohmer's The Castle of Fu Manchu
summary_text: An evil Chinese mastermind plots to freeze the Earth's oceans.

name: Guns for San Sebastian
summary_text: In 1743, outlaw Leon Alastray is hunted by the Spanish army but is given sanctuary by a priest in a village terrorized by marauding Yaqui Indians.

name: Humanity and Paper Balloons
summary_text: The lives of two slum neighbors, one of a happy-go-lucky gambler and the other of a poor ronin, converge when the two get involved with the affairs of a powerful samurai official and his gangsters.

name: Charlie Chan in London
summary_text: Charlie visits a wealthy country home in England. Suspects in the murder range from a housekeeper, to a stableman, to a lawyer.

name: Lemon
summary_text: A man watches his life unravel after he is left by his girlfriend of 10 years.

name: Officer Downe
summary_text: Based on the graphic novel, a police officer who can't be stopped by death returns to the streets time and time again to fight crime.

name: Forget Me Not
summary_text: Love Happens. When you least expect it. Forget Me Not is a moving, modern day love story set over twenty four hours against a stunning London backdrop.

name: Balas & Bolinhos
summary_text: A group of friends meet and combine a robbery from a gasoline station.

name: Fan chan

name: Autobahnraser
summary_text: The young policeman Karl-Heinz Krause works undercover to insinuate himself into a group of Autobahn racers. While he gets to like the illegal races, besides he has to chase some people dealing stolen cars.

name: Záhrada
summary_text: Jakub's life arrived at a dead-end. He leaves his job, and gets into conflict with his father. The trouble just grows by his relation with a married woman. Breaking out, Jakub realizes the ...                See full summary »

summary_text: During the Prussian army's invasion to Poland in 1793, a young Polish nobleman, Jakub is saved from the imprisonment by a stranger who wants in return to obtain a list of his fellow ...                See full summary »

name: Man on Fire
summary_text: A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

name: Kendasampige
summary_text: When a love story goes awry, two young lovers are forced to take to the road with the police hot on their heels. They escape across Karnataka in a roller-coaster ride that is at once enthralling, exasperating and nail-biting.

name: Ingenious
summary_text: A rags-to-riches story of two friends, a small-time inventor and a sharky salesman, who hit rock bottom before coming up with a gizmo that becomes a worldwide phenomenon.

name: Allegro
summary_text: Famous pianist Zetterström returns home to his native Denmark, to give a concert, just to find out that the choices he has made in his life have affected his love life greatly.

name: Born American
summary_text: A trio of vacationing American students cross the border from Finland to the USSR during the Cold War and are soon imprisoned after a skirmish with Soviet soldiers.

name: St George's Day
summary_text: Follows two infamous London gangsters, Mickey Mannock and Ray Collishaw. Both men are top of the food chain when their world is turned upside down as they lose a shipment of the Russian Mafia's cocaine.

name: The Great Global Warming Swindle
summary_text: Everything you've ever been told about Global Warming is probably untrue. This film blows the whistle on the biggest swindle in modern history. We are told that 'Man Made Global Warming' is...                See full summary »

name: George Carlin: What Am I Doing in New Jersey?
summary_text: George Carlin changes his act by bringing politics into the act, but also talks about the People he can do without, Keeping People Alert, and Cars and Driving part 2.

name: The Halloween Tree
summary_text: Four children learn the origins of Halloween customs while trying to save the life of their friend.

name: Hugo Pool
summary_text: Hugo Pool is a quirky tale of a Los Angeles pool cleaner who falls in love with a young man dying of Lou Gerhig's Disease.

name: Isten hozta örnagy úr

name: Tank 432
summary_text: A team of mercenaries confront nightmarish visions when they become trapped inside an armoured personnel carrier.

name: Delirium
summary_text: Set in a world where love is deemed illegal and can be eradicated with a special procedure. With 95 days to go until her scheduled treatment, Lena Holoway does the unthinkable: she falls in love.

name: The Good Witch's Gift
summary_text: It's a week till Christmas and Sheriff Jake sees a bank robber, he arrested 10 years ago. Jake sets the wedding to Cassie to Dec. 24. Cassie's busy in her gift shop but accepts.

name: Knights
summary_text: In the future, a kickboxer and a robot lead a revolution against ruling cyborgs.

name: The Kremlin Letter
summary_text: During the Cold War a Naval Intelligence officer endowed with a powerful photographic memory is transferred to the CIA to participate in a covert operation in Moscow.

name: Twisted Nerve
summary_text: Martin Durnley (Hywel Bennett) is a troubled young man. With a mother who insists on treating him like a child, a stepfather who can't wait to see the back of him, and a brother with Down's...                See full summary »

name: Demonte Colony
summary_text: After consuming liquor, four friends decide to do something interesting and visit a haunted bungalow. However, they do not realize that they have returned home with an evil spirit.

name: Harold
summary_text: A teenager with an early onset of male-pattern baldness befriends his high school's janitor.

name: Steve + Sky
summary_text: Small time crook Steve leaves jail and meets Sky, a naïeve girl who is also a prostitute. The beginning of a strange but wonderful relationship.

name: Raja Kumarudu
summary_text: After the passing away of his parents, Raja lives with his uncle Dhananjay. Dhananjay manages a hotel while Raja is a model. Raja meets Rani and both fall in love. Meanwhile, Dhananjay ...                See full summary »

name: The Competition
summary_text: Paul Dietrich, at almost 30 years old, is a fading piano prodigy. Heidi Schoonover is a talented young pianist with a promising future. When Paul hears of an upcoming competition that could make his career, he dedicates himself to winning.

name: Lu Over the Wall
summary_text: The story centers on Kai, a gloomy middle school student whose life changes after meeting Lu, a mermaid.

name: Living Among Us
summary_text: Vampires have just made themselves public. Now a group of documentarians have been granted access to learn how they live and coexist with humans. But as reality sets in, the crew realize their very lives are in danger.

name: Wedding Wars
summary_text: After a gay party planner discovers his brother is behind the governor's speech against gay marriage, he decides to go on strike for equal rights.

name: Raju Chacha
summary_text: Raju is hired to pose as uncle to three orphaned kids in order to usurp their inheritance. But he changes his mind after falling in love with their governess and decides to fight the greedy relatives.

name: Refugee
summary_text: A young man who smuggles illegal weapons and people back and forth over the borders between India and Pakistan falls in love with a young woman whose family he helped.

name: Magic in the Water
summary_text: Two siblings find out about a mythical aquatic monster and try to a save a remote Canadian lake from being used as a dump site for toxic waste.

name: Khuda Gawah
summary_text: Baadshah Khan falls in love with Benazir, a member of a rival clan who has defeated him in a game of buzkashi.

name: Track of the Cat
summary_text: Around the turn of the 20th century, during a harsh northern California winter, members of a ranching family are squabbling among themselves while the two oldest sons go hunting for a panther that is killing their livestock.

name: The Black Rose
summary_text: A disinherited 13th Century Saxon nobleman leaves Norman England with an archer friend to seek his fortune in the Far East.

name: Terra
summary_text: A visually stunning documentary that reflects human's relationship to other species on Earth as humanity becomes more and more isolated from Nature.

name: Maya the Bee Movie
summary_text: Maya is a little bee with a big heart! Join her on an epic adventure.

name: Gitler kaput!
summary_text: A Russian WW2 spy spoof following misadventures of a clueless Soviet secret agent trapped inside Hitler's inner circle.

name: Chirutha
summary_text: The consequences that follow after the love between hero and heroine, when they accidentally fall in love on an island.

name: Yeti: Curse of the Snow Demon
summary_text: A plane flight carrying a college football team crashes in the Himalayas. Surviving the crash was only part of their problem. Trying not to become a meal for the monster lurking in the mountains will be their greater challenge.

name: Gordy
summary_text: A talking pig named Gordy becomes involved in a quest to save his family from the slaughterhouse.

name: Just Before Nightfall
summary_text: Charles Masson, an advertising executive, is having an affair with Laura, the wife of his best friend, the architect François Tellier. Charles strangles Laura when one of their S&M games ...                See full summary »

name: Cash on Demand
summary_text: A charming but ruthless criminal holds the family of a bank manager hostage as part of a cold-blooded plan to steal 97,000 pounds.

summary_text: Two bumbling plumbers are hired by a socialite to fix a leak. A case of mistaken identity gets the pair an invitation to a fancy party and an entree into high society. As expected, things ...                See full summary »

name: Arsenal
summary_text: A soldier returns to Kiyv after surviving a train crash and encounters clashes between nationalists and collectivists.

name: Ghost Team
summary_text: A paranormal-obsessed man mounts his own investigation into the beyond with his depressed best friend, misfit nephew, a cable access medium and an overeager security guard.

name: Hyakuen no koi

name: Ibn el-Qunsul
summary_text: After spending 30 years in prison, a man comes out to find out he has a son. Together with his son and a newly-acquired friend he resumes his criminal life.

name: Chattahoochee
summary_text: In 1955 Florida, a Korean vet has a breakdown and is incarcerated in a "maximum security" mental health prison, where patients are abused.

name: Seven Crystal Balls and the Prisoners of the Sun
summary_text: Tintin travels to Peru to rescue some archaeologists from an old inca curse.

name: New Tale of Zatoichi
summary_text: Wishing to find peace, Zatoichi travels to his old village but only finds trouble when he ends up in a love triangle and finds old scores have followed him home.

name: The Hollywood Revue of 1929
summary_text: An all-star revue featuring MGM contract players.

name: Tiger Eyes
summary_text: After Davey's father is killed in a hold-up, she and her mother and younger brother visit relatives in New Mexico. Here Davey is befriended by a young man who helps her find the strength to carry on and conquer her fears.

name: Rio, I Love You
summary_text: Third installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature-film is made of 10 stories of romance set in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: The Chameleon
summary_text: An FBI Agent is hot on the tracks of Frédéric Fortin who has taken up the identity of a woman's long lost son, completely convincing the police and the boy's family of his identity.
